edu.mit.appinventor.raspberrypi

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mit.appinventor.raspberrypi.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttCallback

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttCallback
    This is the Raspberry Pi Server class and it implements the MqttCallback interface. The server listens for any incoming MQTT messages, and upon receiving a message starts a new ListenerSevice thread. The Executor is initialized with a default THREAD_POOL_SIZE of 10 .
    Author:
    Thilanka Munasinghe (thilankawillbe@gmail.com)
